mapper.select: SELECT b.board_idx, b.title, bf.file_name FROM boards b left outer join board_files bf on (b.board_idx = bf.board_idx) ORDER BY b.board_idx desc limit #{param1}, #{param2}

SELECT b.board_idx, m.name, b.create_date, b.title, b.content, bf.file_name FROM boards b LEFT OUTER JOIN board_files bf ON (b.board_idx = bf.board_idx) LEFT OUTER JOIN members m ON (b.member_idx = m.member_idx) WHERE b.board_idx=#{boardIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hgs.boards (member_idx, title, content) VALUES (#{memberIdx},#{title},#{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE hgs.boards SET title = #{title}, contact = #{content}, where board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hgs.board_files (board_idx, file_name, size) VALUES (#{boardIdx},#{fileName},#{size})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM hgs.board_likes WHERE board_Idx=#{boardIdx} AND member_Idx=#{memberIdx}
